entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -5.2°C

Humidity: 94 %

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
